test_name: Verify Filtering Products by Price Range in Women Category
description: Test the functionality of filtering products by a specified price range in the Women category page.
steps: Navigate to the Women category page.
Locate the 'Min price' and 'Max price' filter fields.
Wait for the page to refresh with filtered product listing.
Verify that only products within the specified price range are displayed.
expected_results: Products within the specified price range are displayed.
No products outside the range are shown.
Filter criteria persist upon refreshing the page.
edge_cases: Products outside the price range are displayed.
No products are displayed despite valid filter inputs.
Filter inputs do not accept valid numbers.
data_requirements: A list of products with varying prices in the Women category.
Correct mapping of products to their respective prices.
No missing price data for any product.
Frontend and backend communication for filter functionality.
dependencies: Products must load properly on the page.
Backend endpoint for filtering must be available.
Correct price data for all products.
JavaScript functionality for filter button interaction.
api_interactions: Verify API endpoint for fetching filtered product data.
Ensure filter criteria are passed to the backend API.
performance_metrics: Filtering operation should complete within 2 seconds.
Page should not experience lag during filtering.
Filter button interaction should be seamless.
accessibility_requirements: Filter fields must be accessible via keyboard navigation.
Filter labels must have clear descriptions for screen readers.
Ensure no visual elements overlap or block the filter fields.
